message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I rejected your offer because I believe in fairness. Let's split it evenly.
I'll compromise, a bit closer to even
It seems like you're willing to compromise. I'm offering a bit more than you did, let's close this deal.
Getting closer, meet me in the middle of our last offers
I appreciate you trying to find middle ground.  This is a slight concession on my part to meet you closer.
